full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Request for Proposal (RFP) for Storage Maintenance Services**

**Tender Notice Number:** SSC-R169976-BPM021948
**Publication Date:** September 17, 2024
**Closing Date:** October 1, 2024 at 14:00 hours

## Project Overview

The Shared Services Canada is seeking proposals from qualified bidders to provide storage support and maintenance services for the EMC ECS EX300 (or equivalent) storage systems. The proposed contract period will be 1 year with 2 option years.

## Deliverables

The successful bidder will be required to provide the following services:

* Maintenance and repair services for the EMC ECS EX300 (or equivalent) storage systems
* Warranty extension for the storage systems
* Annual milestone payments

## Submission Requirements

* All bids must be submitted through the P2P portal by the specified closing date and time.
* Bidders must register in the P2P portal to access the solicitation and submit their bid.
* Electronic bid submission is mandatory.

## Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada
* Contact Person: Sandra Ladouceur
* Email (if available): [Not provided]
* Phone: 613-302-0766
* Fax: 613-960-6026

## Tender Documents

* The solicitation package can be accessed through the P2P portal.
* Instructions for registration and bid submission are available in the solicitation package.

## Trade Agreements

The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

Note the rewritten text avoided redundant and irrelevant information while maintaining the essential details. Also, ensure the rewritten text is concise and within the 400-word limit.
